page.title: 13Housing
page.content: North Queensferry contains old village housing and council housing estates. There is a large proportion of private housing and new housing estates are being built around the town. South Queensferry consists mainly of old property-some very old buildings (see landscaepe and buildings.) In the last three years some private companies have built new properties. Revelbank is a new estate of large modern bungalows and villas.These houses were sold for about Â£70 000 each.Near the Wheatsheaf Restaurant. South Queensferry harbour,a new development of small linked villages has been built.
